page.title: 02STREET GAMES
page.content: A Street Game Called Fox Off. The game called Fox Off goes like this: First of all you get two teams. There should be the same number of people in each team.One team runs, the other team chases you.When they catch you they take you back to a base. There is a guard on the base to try and stop members of your own team tigging you free. A Street Game Called Bulldog. Bulldog is a game where you can have any number of people.One person is on and the others have to try and get past him or her. When you are caught you are also on. Then when all the people are caught the game is finished. Amanda J Sykes. Aged 13.
